name: Spritshard
description:
A terrible evil is about to overtake our world. An entity known as the Infection corrupts and consumes everything it sees. The hero of our tale, Matcha, has been tasked to take down this evil… however, they aren’t ready yet… 

O great deity of the beyond will you please protect our hero on their journey?
